snippet.title: Dumb Ways: Free For All | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
DUMB WAYS: FREE FOR ALL, COMING TO META QUEST 3 NOVEMBER 7! Wishlist now:
https://www.meta.com/experiences/dumb-ways-free-for-all/7763282913797845/

In this brand new VR adventure from Dumb Ways to Die, Ninny will be taking you to ‘mostly safe’ vacation spots around the globe with Dumb Tours – so pack your bags and get ready for a wild ride full of dumb mayhem! Travel to picturesque vacation spots, each packed with wacky minigames themed to each destination.

Why travel solo when you can bring up to 5 friends along for some seriously dumb and chaotic fun! It’s every Bean for themselves in this mini-game extravaganza, as you compete against (and sabotage) your fellow Bean travellers to snag the top score in your vacation activities.

Prepare for the craziest vacation you’ve ever had, with Dumb Ways: Free For All! Stay tuned for more updates – you won’t want to miss out! 

@MetaQuestVR
